name: Атака
note:
Умение № 1 будет использоваться, когда выбирается команда атаки.
<setup action>
  CHANGE VARIABLE 152 = user._actorId
  CHANGE VARIABLE 118 = target._actorId
     common event: 7
</setup action>
<target action>
action effect: target

if (target.result().hpDamage<=0||!target.result().success)&&!target.isEnemy()
  common event: 3
end
if !target.isEnemy()&&target.result().hpDamage>0 
  common event: 5
end 
if (target.result().hpDamage>0)&&target.isEnemy()
  common event: 8
end
</target action>
